data.title: Warriors NBA Champions and Playworks
data.meta_description: Golden State Warriors and Playworks have had a long-standing relationship thru our partnership with Kaiser Permanente and the GetFit program. Kaiser Permanente,Playworksand the Golden State Warriors have teamed up to

Northern California

Northern California

Congratulations to the 2018 NBA Champions Golden State Warriors!

Updates

Champions

GetFit

Kaiser

NBA

Steph Curry

Warriors

Golden State Warriors and Playworks have had a long-standing relationship thru our partnership with Kaiser Permanente and the GetFit program.

Kaiser Permanente, Playworks and the Golden State Warriors have teamed up to educate Bay Area youth on the importance of healthy eating and active living. The program serves to reinforce healthy behavior and provide youth with the opportunities and resources that are critical to their future success.

We congratulate the three-time NBA champions, the Golden State Warriors, and salute their commitment to children and helping us bring safe and healthy play in our schools.
